directions: Pulse the kimchi in a food processor to roughly chop. Add the mayonnaise, ketchup, ginger and salt; pulse to combine. Store in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour or until ready to use.
Serve with peeled shrimp for dipping.
ingredients: 1 cup kimchi, such as Mother in Law's (vegan)
2 pounds cooked and peeled large shrimp
title: Korean Shrimp Cocktail
